attention3.ptxt: This thermometer indicates the ambient temperature in back of front bumper member. Under any one of the following listed conditions, however, even when the ambient temperature goes up, the thermometer display does not rise so as to correct the rise of the ambient temperature caused by the radiant heat of the engine. When the ambient temperature drops, the thermometer reading follows the change in the temperature.
Be sure to bear this in mind when diagnosing trouble.

item.ptxt: The vehicle speed is 30 km/h (18 mph) or lower.
The ignition switch is turned on again within 2 hours.

action.ptxt: Replace fuse and check for short circuit.
Check outside air temperature sensor referring to Outside Air Temperature Sensor Inspection (If Equipped) .
Check ECM for DTC referring to DTC Check .
Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.

ps.ptxt: Outside air temperature is –30 °C (–22 °F) or less

action.ptxt: Check outside air temperature sensor referring to Outside Air Temperature Sensor Inspection (If Equipped) .

ps.ptxt: Outside air temperature sensor wiring circuit open circuit and/or short to power circuit

action.ptxt: Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.

ps.ptxt: Outside air temperature is 50 °C (122 °F) or more

action.ptxt: Check outside air temperature sensor referring to Outside Air Temperature Sensor Inspection (If Equipped) .

ps.ptxt: Outside air temperature sensor wiring circuit short to ground circuit

action.ptxt: Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.
